original: @141a // bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @141a // bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the sublime masters.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The inconceivable yogi

original: snying rje'i rang sems glo bur sad //
analyzed: snying rje'i rang sems glo bur sad //
translated: Awakens to the nature of compassion.

original: shes rab skye ba med rgyas btab //
analyzed: shes rab skye ba med rgyas btab //
translated: The seal of non-arising wisdom is applied.

original: gnyis med bsam mi khyab mtshan nyid //
analyzed: gnyis med bsam mi khyab mtshan nyid //
translated: The characteristic of non-dual inconceivability

original: snang ba'i skye ba med pa dran //
analyzed: snang ba'i skye ba med pa dran //
translated: Remembers the non-arising of appearances.

original: dran pa'i rang bzhin gzung ba med //
analyzed: dran pa'i rang bzhin gzung ba med //
translated: The nature of mindfulness is ungraspable.

original: gzugs sogs dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: gzugs sogs dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By the nature of entities such as form,

original: bde ba chen po'i ro myong bas //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ro myong bas //
translated: The taste of great bliss is experienced.

original: bsam du med pa'i rnal 'byor rtogs //
analyzed: bsam du med pa'i rnal 'byor rtogs //
translated: The inconceivable yoga is realized.

original: de yang / bla ma'i drin gyis slar yang ni //
analyzed: de yang / bla ma'i drin gyis slar yang ni //
translated: Moreover, through the kindness of the master,

original: so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of discernment arises again.

original: de yang / ji ltar myong bas bskyed pas na //
analyzed: de yang / ji ltar myong bas bskyed pas na //
translated: Moreover, since it is generated by experience,

original: dran pas gzung dang ma gzung med //
analyzed: dran pas gzung dang ma gzung med //
translated: Mindfulness is beyond grasping and non-grasping.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pas //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pas //
translated: Since cause and effect are inseparable,

original: sgom pa'i rim pa bdag la med //
analyzed: sgom pa'i rim pa bdag la med //
translated: I have no stages of meditation.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ro tshor bas //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ro tshor bas //
translated: The taste of emptiness is felt.

original: sgom pa yang ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgom pa yang ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: Meditation is also realized.

original: gang phyir shes rab sgom pa yis //
analyzed: gang phyir shes rab sgom pa yis //
translated: Since wisdom is cultivated,

original: thams cad phyag rgya chen po la //
analyzed: thams cad phyag rgya chen po la //
translated: Everything is mah캐mudr캐.

original: gang zhig mi mthun phyogs su yang //
analyzed: gang zhig mi mthun phyogs su yang //
translated: Whatever is discordant

original: de nyid phyag rgya chen po la //
analyzed: de nyid phyag rgya chen po la //
translated: is mah캐mudr캐.

original: rang bzhin ltug  pa bsam du med //
analyzed: rang bzhin ltug  pa bsam du med //
translated: The natural state is inconceivable.

original: ji srid bye brag gnyis 'byung ba //
analyzed: ji srid bye brag gnyis 'byung ba //
translated: As long as the two distinctions arise,

original: de las byung ni de ru thim //
analyzed: de las byung ni de ru thim //
translated: they arise from that and dissolve into that.

original: de las bde ba'i ye shes pas //
analyzed: de las bde ba'i ye shes pas //
translated: Since there is gnosis of bliss,

original: 'bras bu dag las re ba med //
analyzed: 'bras bu dag las re ba med //
translated: there is no hope for results.

original: yid la mi byed rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: yid la mi byed rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogi who does not mentally engage

original: stong nyid snying po bsam du med //
analyzed: stong nyid snying po bsam du med //
translated: the inconceivable essence of emptiness

original: gnyis med shes rab rang so la //
analyzed: gnyis med shes rab rang so la //
translated: in the natural state of nondual wisdom

original: mnyam gzhag rjes thob rig pa med //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag rjes thob rig pa med //
translated: has no awareness of equipoise and post-equipoise.

original: bsam med rgyun gyi rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: bsam med rgyun gyi rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogi of the constant, inconceivable

original: gnyis su mi byed rang so nyid //游댷ma skyes pa nyid dngos @141b por sad //
analyzed: gnyis su mi byed rang so nyid // ma skyes pa nyid dngos @141b por sad //
translated: does not make duality, but is natural.游댷The unborn is awakened as an entity.

original: dngos por skye ba med par thim //
analyzed: dngos por skye ba med par thim //
translated: An entity dissolves into non-arising.

original: dngos su gnyis med rdo rjer mthun //
analyzed: dngos su gnyis med rdo rjer mthun //
translated: In actuality, nonduality is unified in the vajra.

original: nyes pa dbang sogs glo bur ba //游댷des na drang thad so ma ste //
analyzed: nyes pa dbang sogs glo bur ba // des na drang thad so ma ste //
translated: Faults such as desire are adventitious.游댷Therefore, it is fresh, just as it is.

original: de dang da nyid thad kar bcas //
analyzed: de dang da nyid thad kar bcas //
translated: That and this are unified in actuality.

original: skye ba med mthong rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: skye ba med mthong rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogi who sees nonarising

original: shes pa mi bzung rang thad zhog / skye ba med pa'i sems nyid la ;
analyzed: shes pa mi bzung rang thad zhog / skye ba med pa'i sems nyid la ;
translated: Do not grasp at consciousness, but rest in your own place.

original: / ci zhig bsdus shing ci zhig spro //
analyzed: / ci zhig bsdus shing ci zhig spro //
translated: What is there to be gathered or dispersed游댷in the unborn nature of mind?

original: au pa de sha pa ra ma pa ya /
analyzed: au pa de sha pa ra ma pa ya /
translated: Upadisheshaparamartha

original: gsang ba dam pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: gsang ba dam pa rdzogs so//
translated: The highest secret is complete.
